roleset.name: to explain badly, make no sense
roleset.note: MISINTERPRET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'misinterpret' based on 'interpret'; nominal 'misinterpretation' based on BOLT-6. (from misinterpret.01-v)
MISINTERPRETATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from misinterpretation.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: [His comments]-1 were misinterpreted [*-1]as a sign that higher interest rates are possible .
example.arg: as a sign that higher interest rates are possible

example.name: transitive
example.text: They-2 simply got carried away with [*-2] misinterpreting what the executive order banning assassinations really meant [*T*-1].
example.arg: what the executive order banning assassinations really meant [*T*-1]

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Investors misinterpreted the KKR move as a desire [*ICH*-1] by the firm [*]to wash its hands of SCI TV .
example.arg: as a desire [*ICH*-1] by the firm [*]to wash its hands of SCI TV

example.name: nominal rel: misinterpretation
example.text: Ha - ha , the Spring Festival Gala of this year has passed . Otherwise , we could put the case between old Jiang of Deka Company and the local government on the stage of the Spring Festival Gala , inviting the audience nationwide to judge who is right and who is wrong , so as to promote the development of the local soft environment and rectify the misinterpretation of the word " soft environment " by some current government officials .
